title: I'v figured out how to deal with the "OP" Auto attack champions.
body:
https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/hphotos-xaf1/t51.2885-15/s320x320/e15/11246929_1624242634478949_919438306_n.jpg


{{champion:75}} : "Wow remember all that attack speed you USE to have?"

replies.body: {{champion:11}} Do you mean the one I still have?
Yi doesn't lose movement speed but he loses the attack speed
Yi's ult actually makes him immune to attackspeed slows as well.
not immune to nasus 1 shot.
Death is the best CC.
{{champion:30}} - You just activated my trap card!
Yi is durable enough to survive a couple of Q's and will just lifestyle through the rest while he melts through whatever tank items Nasus built

More like Yi is durable enough to survive one Q with LS and Nasus will kill him with the next autoattack.

{{champion:75}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3031}}  {{item:3158}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3071}}
{{item:3053}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3930}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3156}}  {{champion:11}}: What's this "one shot" you're talking about?
{{champion:75}} : 10000 stacks has something to say to you.
What you need to counter nasus is {{item:3102}}
Wow, hen that is pretty dumb imo...

he used to be immune to fears and charms as well because they have a slow attached to them, at least they fixed that, now if you charm him you have a master yi running at you at the speed of light and fiddle's fear is basically a poppy ult on him
Charm actually still slows him. Fears are hilarious though.

{{champion:11}} : GOT YOU KNOW, SCARECROW!
{{champion:9}} Boo.
{{champion:11}} AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
*Master Yi then runs all the way back to base thanks to highlander.*

the fear interaction I learned when i played yi in aram for the first time, had summoner ghost and rushed a ghostblade... and they had fiddle so I ulted and almost reached my own inhibitor from their first tower D:
Thats because it's not considered a slow. Which is why Ahri is such a hardcore Yi counter.
His Attack Speed can still be lowered just not his move speed.
It was changed a long time ago.

Damn you Yi

The only champ I can't splitpush against

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=e2aFlvZW,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2016-02-15T03:31:54.197+0000)
>
> Damn you Yi
> 
> The only champ I can't splitpush against

What if you picked Yi as well?
I meant when I'm playing Nasus lol and I can't splitpush anymore because there is no way I can 1v1  him
Nasus also has Life steal, and can get more, as well as Attack speed
Yi is immune to all slows, duh.
Just get 6 {{item:3047}} and let the dodge chance work wonders.
{{champion:15}} Somebody say dodge chance?
{{champion:24}} WHERE?
Old jax had 18% dodge chance. Old Sivir had 25%.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gI1aeS5H1Vs
mother of god
60% dodge...that's hilarious.  Downside is you build nothing else.
That's why you build 1 Ninja Tabi and 5 Phantom Dancers, duh
lol but you will still dodge most autoattacks
Except in this early game meta games snowball out of control far before Nasus becomes a problem.
Can't you ever just enjoy a joke?
RIP Dodge stat

Jihn is not amused

Because that AS slow does nothing to his AS or AD
That's a fixed bug
or will be in 6.4
Nasus can only wither one person though, even at max CD. When you play against a full AD comp, you best hope your team doesn't feed repeatedly while you farm.
If you play anyone you better hope your team doesn't feed. I've had several games where I came out of the top lane 4/0/0 and we lost because mid, bot, and jg were all behind.
shit, I've had games where I've gone 20/3/1 and I've lost because of my team being way behind.
Learn Yasuo I guarantee you won't ever lose a game where you get a score like that
I'm best at AP assassins for some reason Cx

Thing about AP assassins is that if you are the only one doing damage on your team, then you can't do anything against enemies tanky enough to survive your burst, at least in my experience. Not so with Yasuo. Maybe it's just Bronze, but I have legitimately 1v4'd on multiple occasions after getting fed with Yas, not something I could do with Kat
I suck on Kat Cx. but yeah, that is entirely true, which is why it sucks that AP assassins are my only true carry, 30/0/0 role :/

IRELIA 
Killed u 4 times at 15 minutes. Denies u all the farm. Wards your jungle. Kills your jungler so they cant help. Destroys topside of the map. Smiles as your team reports you for feeding.

God i love getting to late game, you've been farming all game, 40 minute game, you have 1k stacks, out comes their entire team. Hey we got u cornered, its a 1v5 you c- OH GOD HE JUST 1 SHOT OUR ADC RUUUUUUUUUUUUUUN.
{{champion:54}}
if only his Wither was still a 90% attack speed slow :/
